gameslist.Name: Update Indiegame Garden!
gameslist.Descr: Hold ENTER to update Indiegame Garden itself. Once installed, simply restart to get the new version.

gameslist.Name: "Aurelic" by Torley
gameslist.Descr: From the album "Glitch Piano". Hit "W" for Torley's website. (CC BY-NC-SA license.)

gameslist.Name: "Zalgone" by Torley
gameslist.Descr: From the album "Glitch Piano". Hit "W" for Torley's website. (CC BY-NC-SA license.)

gameslist.Name: "Sublime" by Space Explorer(s)
gameslist.Descr: Hit "W" for Space Explorer(s) website. (CC BY license.)

gameslist.Name: Dwarf Fortress 0.34.02
gameslist.Descr: Single-player fantasy game set in a randomly generated, persistent world. Amazingly, all visuals are ASCII.
gameslist.Help: You can maximize the window to see a larger map area during the game.

gameslist.Name: Fox aliens from space invade a planet within space
gameslist.Descr:
"jump as mr zuper hero dude, stop em aliens, bring their ships down destroy dem walkers."
Press "W" to visit the YoYoGames website of this game. GameMaker is great, try it!

gameslist.Name: Wither
gameslist.Descr: Short RPG made in old gameboy style. Press "W" to visit the rpgmaker.net site for this game!

gameslist.Name: Starman
gameslist.Descr: Jump on the goomba!

gameslist.Name: You Can't Possibly Expect Me To Do That! 2
gameslist.Descr:
The Space Station Catalyst Planet Exploration Crew is recruiting new members! If you can complete
the training exercise, you will become a member of the crew. Discover 5(erm, 4, or maybe 3) planets of
varying terrain, from firey tempests to temples overrun with foliage!

gameslist.Name: Eyeball 3D: Maze of Felsh
gameslist.Descr:
Can you help this two-legged eyeball conquer evil?
The author warns you may have issues running the game. (Some initial blinking is normal.)

gameslist.Name: Recursion
gameslist.Descr: tbd

gameslist.Name: Calicoland
gameslist.Descr:
A grayscale adventure. Jump through the strange trouble-infested badlands in search of coins! Avoid the tiny elephants!
Don't leap on the roly-roly's spikes! Hit the mysterious question mark blocks to make something surprising happen! You might get a coin... or you 
MIGHT awaken the vengeful sky gods. Keep your wits about you! It's procedurally generated, which means new 
surprises on different play-throughs!

gameslist.Name: Super Crate Box
gameslist.Descr: Prepare for an arcade delight with tight controls, refreshing game mechanics, cracking retro art and a terribly hip chiptune soundtrack.

gameslist.Name: Yeti Hunter
gameslist.Descr: a Vlambeer game about hunting yetis - music by Kozilek
gameslist.Help:
mouse=look, WASD=move, rmb=scope, lmb=shoot, SHIFT=run,
R=restart, CTRL=duck/climb down trees, walk up a tree to climb

gameslist.Name: Mythic Defence - The rise of evil
gameslist.Descr: Tower defence with 25 waves of onslaught with 6 different races; over 30 different towers to choose from. Can you hold your line?
gameslist.Exe: Mythic Defence - The rise of evil.exe

gameslist.Name: Game Title
gameslist.Descr: "a zelda-esque dungeon crawler, but you only have one hit point, various weapons are hidden to ease the difficulty"

gameslist.Name: Game Title: Lost Levels
gameslist.Descr:
This is a sort of sequel to Game Title, inspired a bug that came up. It is very difficult to complete it. It is possible to complete it.
It is possible to get stuck. If you're not absolutely certain that you're stuck, you're probably not stuck. Sorry.

gameslist.Name: Minestein 3D
gameslist.Descr:
A mashup of Wolfenstein 3D and Minecraft. You can hit Enter/PageUp/KeypadEnter at any time to switch between editor
mode and action mode. It's sort of a Wolf3D construction kit. (If the default level takes a while to load, that's normal.)

gameslist.Name: Space Mass
gameslist.Descr: Blocks, nothing but blocks... destroy blocks, use your grappling hook, collect the key, find the exit door.
gameslist.Help: Hint: you can zoom out to an overall map by pressing 'v'

gameslist.Name: HoneyBlaster
gameslist.Descr:
Classic action shoot'em up game, where the player is not a spaceship but a... bumble-bee.
TAKE CARE: McAfee on-demand virus scan deletes ezip.dll claiming a virus, breaking the game.

gameslist.Name: Relay
gameslist.Descr:
Soooo, I focused on an aspect of Pokemon and ended up with a game that has nothing to do with Pokemon but you 
know, like, whatever.

gameslist.Name: Not Pokemon
gameslist.Descr:
Not Pokemon Use the arrow keys to move (sorry, it's actually WASD), ESC to quit! GOTTA CATCH 'EM 
ALL!

gameslist.Name: Monster March
gameslist.Descr:
Monsters are auditioning for a play ...or something. Spot 'em 
all!

gameslist.Name: After Dark
gameslist.Descr: Just playing with the editor & getting a feel for it :)

gameslist.Name: Two Castles - Finished now yay
gameslist.Descr:
Only had an hour to do this and it's unfinished.  sorry!  It's over when you hit the void.  EDIT: Okay, it's

Stories.

gameslist.Name: Soccer Judge: The Revenge
gameslist.Descr:
Made in literally 10 minutes, mostly by my friend Liam. An epic tale of 
revenge.

gameslist.Name: Hogan's Run
gameslist.Descr:
In a dystopian future where all adults over the age of 29 are executed by the state, you, a new Sandman 
recruit, must train your firearm skills by shooting a spinning can in midair to make it bounce upward. 
Featuring an acclaimed soundtrack by Wario Ware Inc.'s own 9-Volt. You can score bonus points by hunting and 
shooting "points of interest" as they appear. It's up to you to guess as to what those 
are!

gameslist.Name: Robotfindskitten 2: The Kittening
gameslist.Descr: This is my tribute to one of the greatest games of all time...

gameslist.Name: Catatoniac
gameslist.Descr: Some people just aren't prepared for the call to adventure.

gameslist.Name: Police Police Police Police
gameslist.Descr:
As the Chief of Police it is for some reason your job to personally bring beat cops over to the drunks who are 
trying to ruin a Police concert. PROTIP: event security can stop drunks but they will be too beat up to 
continue working, and they don't do anything while partying with 
groupies.

gameslist.Name: Fruit Bomb Future Counter
gameslist.Descr:
Another game inspired purely by a funny-looking sprite. I put a lot less thought into this than my previous 
games, but I finished ten minutes before the deadline which seems rather amazing right now. It turned out 
funnier than expected. (I didn't expect it to be funny whatsoever)

gameslist.Name: AMAZONS
gameslist.Descr: get shot by amazons. live your dream.

gameslist.Name: Dudes and Swords
gameslist.Descr:
A combat game for up to four players where you combat with swords. Graffix by me, sounds from 
Blood.

gameslist.Name: Spinzy
gameslist.Descr:
You're in a swimming pool, naked, swinging around on some rope, trying to escape police officers who aren't 
keen on the whole situation.

gameslist.Name: The darkness that lurks
gameslist.Descr:
An attempt at a horror game. I think I managed the horror part, but not so much the game 
part.

gameslist.Name: pnok
gameslist.Descr:
player 1 uses a and d key, player 2 uses left right arrow try and push the squares into your opponents 
goal!

gameslist.Name: Tutankhamen's Pancake Breakfast
gameslist.Descr:
You thought it would be easy working the night shift at a pancake restaurant but nobody told you there was a 
pharaoh convention in town!

gameslist.Name: Ball Sort: Robot Sim
gameslist.Descr:
Be a robot! Sort some balls! Put the balls in the correct colored 
bin.

gameslist.Name: You Have A Jetpack
gameslist.Descr:
You have a jetpack. Fly. (Mostly an exercise in gaining some experience with Inform 
7.)

gameslist.Name: Me and Rectangles
gameslist.Descr: a game about my childhood

gameslist.Name: Not a Romantic Comedy
gameslist.Descr:
I have no idea what this trainwreck is really about, but I created it to sort of celebrate my completion of 
Chip's Challenge last weekend. Chip falls in love with Melinda the Mental Marvel, and goes on a quest to get 
sexual favors. Or something. And then stuff happens. Also, it has my voice. Fear my voice. Another thing you 
should know about this game is that it does a pretty good job at replicating the frustration you experience 
playing the actual Chip's Challenge. So there you go. Made in MMF2. Requires DirectX 8 hardware acceleration 
and 1280x800 resolution or higher.

gameslist.Name: World Shmup 2010
gameslist.Descr:
World Cup?  More like... WORLD SHMUP Lead ace Slovenia National Football Team star Samir HandanoviÄ to win 
the WORLD SHMUP as you fight against players from America, Algeria, and England.  Just like in the real 2010 
World Cup!

gameslist.Name: Do Bugs Have Hearts
gameslist.Zip: www.glorioustrainwrecks.com/files/slightly less light ugly - Do Bugs Have Hearts.knytt.rar
gameslist.Descr: A short search.

gameslist.Name: Oh Man Go Time
gameslist.Descr: Guide Juni through pointless obstacles towards a new tomorrow!

gameslist.Name: Trapped in a tower full of spikes
gameslist.Descr:
What, i can say?. its a KS level done in two hours, using two custom tilesets and a music file. 
:3

gameslist.Name: Jogger Stories
gameslist.Descr:
Doo! Doo doo doo dooooo! Jogger Stories. Press Esc to enter. You can't die, so just enjoy the scenery. Made in 
MMF2. Requires DirectX 8 with hardware acceleration and 1280x800 resolution or higher. Edit: Uploaded wrong 
file. This is the right one.
